Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin seated on the ground with the Christ Child on her lap, reaching out to pick some grapes from a basket, behind to right St Joseph saddling the donkey, and a cottage to left Pen and brown ink with brown wash
Curator's comments: J. Bolten, 'Abraham Bloemaert. The Drawings', 2007, under no.124 (as a copy of a lost design by Bloemaert, of which other copies are in Darmstadt and another sold Christie's, Amsterdam, 14 Nov. 1988, lot 18; similar figures to Joseph appear in many of Bloemaert's works)
Bibliographic references: Popham (D & F) 1932 / Dutch and Flemish drawings of the XV and XVI centuries (2)
